column1: 4.1.4.3.4.4	Summary of evidence and recommendations for cystoplasty/urinary diversion

Offer early follow-up to women who have been commenced on anticholinergic or beta-3 
agonist therapy.

Offer repeat injections of onabotulinumtoxinA, as required, to women in whom it has been 
effective (refer to the manufacturerâ€™s guidance regarding the minimum timeframe for repeat 
injections).

Offer life-long surveillance to women who have a sacral nerve stimulation implant to monitor 
for lead displacement, malfunction, and battery wear.

Offer cystoscopic surveillance to women with an augmentation cystoplasty due to the small 
risk of malignancy.
